name: sql-warehouse
title: Data Warehousing with Identity, PK/FK, Stored Proc and loops
description: Explore the latest SQL warehouse capabilities: incremental column and Primary + Foreign Key, strored procedure, loops and more!
fullDescription:
To simplify SQL operations and support migrations from on-prem and alternative warehouse, Databricks Lakehouse now provide convenient ways to build Entity Relationship Diagrams that are simple to maintain and evolve. In this demo, we'll cover:
  • The ability to automatically generate auto-incrementing identify columns. Just insert data and the engine will automatically increment the ID.
  • Support for defining primary key
  • Support for defining foreign key constraints.
Databricks Lakehouse is the best Datawarehouse!
